name: Baldi's Fun Schoolhouse!
description:
Welcome to Baldi's Fun Schoolhouse! we hope you have a good time here.
new stuff as of 1.0:
elevator
5 item slots (wowzers)
safety scissors got replaced by usb stick because playtime wasnt working (oop-)
new game over screen.

so yeah thats it. i hope i update this project in the future. i really hope i do.
